name: Penpen World
description:
Penpen World is an action game for Windows.

This game has 3 modes. The object of each mode is different.
When you touch the enemies your power decreases.
Once you are out of power, the game is over.

Controls(keyboard or joystick)
Arrow keys(Joystick).... Select, Move
[Z](A Button)....... Start, Shoot
[ESC]............... Quit

Objects
MODE-A
The object is to collect all the diamonds.
MODE-B
The object is to beat all enemies.
MODE-C
The object is to bring all the boxes to the points.
